divs: Sighting DetailsMy mom brother and I were in our apartment..It had a huge window in the living room..I had a crush on a girl that lived across the street..I was 12 years younger then..Anyways We pulled the blinds for my mom to was the windows my brother had one end and I had the other well we pulled them then muy mom said what the hell, I had looked and we saw which was approx...3 blocks ahead an object..we didnt speak to each other..The only way I can describe it is a birthday hat pointing up then another birthday hat under it pointing down..It had a bunch of squares inwhich I assumed windows...We were speachless and scared..My brother had asked mom is that something new mchord air force base is doing...She worked for them and she said hell no...It stayed in one spot for which had seemed about 30 minutes or so..To be honest with you we didnt see it fly away all we know is that we saw it then it was gone....we didnt talk about it because we didnt beleive in it..My mom distilled catholic religion in us...After 13 years me and my mom started talking about it because for the last 10 years I have been doing my own research but my brother wont...Everytime I do I see fear in his eyes and he says very firmly it didnt happen..Me and my brother were close til we talk about this...I remeber as clear as it was yesterday..I told my mom that in my opinion that it had a invisible cloak of some sort and that I think we were abducted..For the last 10 years I have been having dreams of my mom and brother screaming and I cant move to help them...My mom screaming for help then telling me to run if I can hear her voice...No tragic events ever happened in our lives for me to dream that...I felt that they are not here to be nice,easy going, I think they fear us as much as we do them...What do you do when you fear some one and they make a wrong move,you protect yourself...I think we would lose..There can come in any shape,way or form...Why inhabit a planet that is dieing...There is beings on this planet killing the planet..I feel they want this planet but have nothing to do with us because they have watched us long enough kill it...anthony
Summary: it was triangle upright and upside down (no joke)
trends: There have been 29 other sightings in Tacoma
There were no other sightings in Tacoma on or around June 1st 1997
